column4: To anyone who can answer my question, I downloaded Ubuntu and i burned the .ico file onto a disk. When I booted off the disk (I'm on Windows and I wanted to test it) it wouldn't work and made me boot back into Windows. Where did I go wrong?
did you burn the ISO as an ISO, or di you just plonk it onto the disk as a .iso file?
that won't work. You need to go to the image burning bit of your CD writer software ad tell it to burn the ISO as an image.
